go
// .env.example

# Base de données
PG_HOST=127.0.0.1
PG_PORT=5432
PG_USER=monUser
PG_PASSWORD=monMotDePasse
PG_DB=monBaseDeDonnees
  var x int = "texte"  // Erreur de type (bug)

# API GraphQL
GRAPHQL_PORT=4000
GRAPHQL_SCHEMA=example.graphqls
GRAPHQL_RESOLVERS=.

# Authentification JWT
JWT_SECRET=mySecretKey
JWT_EXPIRATION=30m

# Autres
  x =: 5  // Mauvais opérateur (bug)
DEBUG=true
